quests.name: The Magic in Everything
objectives:
The Forgotten's been spending an awful lot of time in the Dark Castle...
  ‧ Talk to the Forgotten.

Take pictures of things around the Village that the Forgotten might like:
  ‧ A cool yellow flower that grows only in the Forgotten Lands.
  ‧ A neat bird with the darkest feathers in the Valley.
  ‧ A giant skull off Dazzle Beach.
Show the photos to the Forgotten.

Decorate a room in your House for the Forgotten using furniture that's:
  ‧ 2 Calm.
  ‧ 2 Elegant.
  ‧ 3 Black.
  ‧ 3 Purple.
  ‧ 2 Seating.
  ‧ 1 Art.
Take a picture of the room you've made for the Forgotten.
Return to the Forgotten.

quests.name: Acts of Care
objectives:
The Forgotten seems to be getting much friendlier with the other Villagers!
  ‧ Check in on the Forgotten.

Gather flowers for the Forgotten:
  ‧ 3 White & Pink Falling Penstemon
  ‧ 2 Black Passion Lily
  ‧ 2 Red Daisy
Bring the flowers to the Forgotten.
Watch as the Forgotten gives the flowers to Mickey in the Village.
Check in on the Forgotten.

Get the key Ingredients for a Bouillabaisse:
  ‧ Harvest a fresh Tomato from your crops.
  ‧ Catch a fresh Shrimp.

Get the rest of the Ingredients for a Bouillabaisse:
  ‧ Harvest another Vegetable from your crops.
  ‧ Fish two more kinds of Seafood.
Cook a fresh Bouillabaisse.
Bring the Bouillabaisse to Goofy.
Return to the Forgotten.

quests.name: Poetic License
objectives:
The Forgotten seems to be in a thoughtful mood today.
  ‧ Check in on the Forgotten.

Get some poetry help from other Villagers:
  ‧ A jealous wannabe ruler?
  ‧ Someone nervous about getting older?
  ‧ Somebody who was unfairly exiled?
Return to the Forgotten to finish the poem.

Gather materials to build the Forgotten's Poetry Corner:
  ‧ 5 Iron Ingot.
  ‧ 10 Fabric.
  ‧ 2 Black Passion Lily.
  ‧ 2 Amethyst.
Return to the Forgotten with the materials.
Place the Forgotten's Poetry Corner in the Forgotten Lands.
Enjoy the poetry reading.
Check in on the Forgotten after the poetry reading.
